page.title: 05Crime in N.St Ives.
page.content: St.Ives is a sleepy area (previously, St.Ives was called Slepe).Police protect the area well.There is not a great deal of major crime,although recently a man was murdered at R.A.F Wyton.Vandals are about the worst criminals in our area,apart from the occasional break-in and very occasional murder.Punishment suggested for crimes are birch,hard labour,and community work.Not many people are burgled in our area.Our school has been vandalised. The swimming-pool was ripped,and concrete. slabs have been thrown in the pool.I have friends whose property has been vandalised, which might prove that vandals are the main problem in our area. Altogether St.Ives is a peaceful place, except for a murder. Vandals are the only problem, and the problem is getting worse,every week,and every year.
